mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s3streamsetobject (object_id, object_size, node_id, sequence_id, sub_streams, base_data_timestamp, committed_timestamp, created_timestamp) VALUES ( #{objectId}, #{objectSize}, #{nodeId}, #{sequenceId}, #{subStreams}, #{baseDataTimestamp}, #{committedTimestamp}, #{createdTimestamp} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(node_id) = 0 AS exclusive FROM (SELECT node_id, JSON_EXTRACT(sub_streams, '$.subStreams.*.streamId') AS ids FROM s3streamsetobject WHERE node_id != #{nodeId}) t WHERE CONVERT(#{streamId}, CHAR) MEMBER OF(t.ids)
